Environment

Description

Mike Spivey's code from POPL course. Modified Proposition to become Proposition.

data Environment v Source

empty_env :: Environment vSource

find :: Environment v -> Proposition -> vSource

maybe_find :: Environment v -> Proposition -> Maybe vSource

define :: Environment v -> Proposition -> v -> Environment vSource

defargs :: Environment v -> [Proposition] -> [v] -> Environment vSource

make_env :: [(Proposition, v)] -> Environment vSource

names :: Environment v -> [Proposition]Source

within :: Environment v -> Environment v -> Environment vSource

type Proposition = StringSource
